it is hard to explain but sometimes when i am feeling really bad it feel like my body is slightly vibrating it only happens if i have been at a bad low for a really long time and i have been really inactive probably laying in bed bc my body is aching so bad anyone else experience this or am i alone in this
i have been down for a long time lately and today all of a sudden it is just flipped felt like sharing it with everyone hope this happens to others going through tough time too cheer

a lot of my fear of intimacy and relationship come from my trauma warped perception that relationship are supposed to mirror my abuse a a child for year i correlated being in a relationship with having no autonomy over myself my thought need and feeling do not matter and that i am completely powerless but yesterday i realized that i have these belief because my brain had equated the abuse i faced a a child to what being in a relationship will be like a a kid i remember having this deep feeling of dread at the thought of ever being in a relationship because i thought any kind of romantic relationship in the future would just mean a continuation of what wa happening to me at the time and meant that i would lose ownership over myself again and be completely powerless

i have been told by several different source that sometimes my eye look dull or lifeless i wa facetiming with my boyfriend and i could not help but notice it the whole time they look dark and lack emotion even though my facial expression do the opposite meanwhile his eye which are a darker color than mine looked like they were shining and i could see how much he adores me just by looking at them and now i am worried he think i hate him or something bc eye are so telling they are what we look at to know what someone is feeling

how intertwined are these two condition i am under the impression that low self esteem fuel depression but i want to know the specific of how they affect each other my low self esteem make up my entire personality and affect every waking thought and decision
i celebrated my wife birthday and two year of sobriety by dumping a whole bottle of bubble bath in a spa tub childhood fantasy

my family and i decided to postpone thanksgiving this year so that we could all eat together a a family i told my parent that i would like to do it so that they could kick back and relax they agreed skip forward to today and i wake up at am to start cooking the foodonly to find out that the food ha already been cooked by my parent i wa immediately frustrated i felt a bit betrayed i know how to do this stuff yet they seemingly do not trust me with it i held my tongue started making the pumpkin pie yet minute into it is baking time the crust burn i lost it i know i should not have and i know that it is literally a crust but i could not stand it

this man had to do double shift just to be able to buy her daughter a new dress he is a true father and a role model to not only his daughter but to all hardworking single parent out there he deserves our love

we do not have to agree or get along at all i have my view point and my term of reference i like to use and you guy have yours i have had my fill of certain user constantly getting at me in the comment if you do not like me or agree with my goal fine whatever whether i am winning or losing in life in life i can do it with or without you a a sufferer of ptsd the one thing i had to learn wa whether or not to engage some people love to be miserable and dictate to others some people do not but enough is enough i am done and i am moving on from any discussion over my ambition

i have been the hospital twice in the past month and i really do not want to go back but i guess i also do not want to die i am just really afraid of being labeled a someone who seek attention i tend to hide my thought because i have them so frequently how do i tell if i am serious or not because i keep trying to kill myself but i do not tend to get very far
i get them so bad i have to sit in my car and shake until they slow down so i can drive it such a weird sensation and i just wonder if any one else get those

i thought i would hit my limit a few month ago when i tried to kill myself but compared to now those time seemed like heaven i just can not live anymore you can always say it will get better do not give up you are stronger than this that is all bullshit i am not strong if i wa strong i would not have covered my whole body in self harm in the space of le than a year i would not have tried to kill myself i would not be such a failure i have a psychologist a psychiatrist i am on med my mum supportive i still feel the way i do i am weak i am so weak and useless i had a horrible cutting incident last night i carved failure into my thigh then cut like mad from my thigh all the way up my hip i cut at least time and i am planning something similar tonight i am so scared i know what i can do to myself and i am scared because i know i will do it i do not deserve to feel this way

i have severe anxiety and it blew up into really bad agoraphobia in the past year and a half i spend of my time confined in my room and with barely any social interaction i do not work and am on disability i have had dpdr a few time before when my panic attack get really bad but lately i think it different like a smell or a tv show or something from a memory of my past will trigger the disconnected feeling and like i am back in that memory the memory is not even particularity traumatic i sometimes will watch tv or a movie and i feel like i am the character and then i start panicking and then that trigger the dpdr i feel like i am gonna go crazy i am scared what is this it it caused from my mind being idle and literally doing nothing but watching netflix hour a day my panic attack are ruthless because i do not feel like myself at all
for me it been since i wa im now it kind of scare me they do work immensely though

my happy sunday morning experience with the storm in the uk being in full swing this morning i got up with the dreaded sunday feeling and a slight hangover i looked out the window and saw the rain coming in sideways and battering the road below in the distance i saw a couple dressed head to toe in waterproof and looking pretty miserable at their foot i saw a black labrador who wa having the best day ever the wetter the better for this guy and he wa trundling down the road looking a though this wa the highlight of his life not much of a story for some but it this doggo really made me smile so thought id share it

like most people here i have experienced significant weight gain since starting seroquel a few month ago to the point where i am considering changing med i have spoken to a couple of my doctor about this and the concern i have surrounding it but they seem to believe that it is not that bad that i need to gain weight anyway so i might a well let it happen while i do have a thin frame that is a natural thing putting on weight will not make me grow out i will just get a belly and it will not look good not to mention be unhealthy but because of this thin frame they refuse to give me anything to halt the weight gain is there anything i can do to change their mind or at least have something to stop the weight gain no matter how much i eat i will put on weight i went a few day without food and still put on weight imnot sure how bad it is going to get and i really need something to help
my long distance boyfriend sent me flower for no particular reason other than that he love me i know it cliche but it make me so happy

i wa just diagnosed with schizophrenia this year there is not much information about it and there a lot of stigma arou d it i have had people think i am faking or that i am dangerous i want to share my experience with people and teach people who are curious about schizophrenia

i dont know how to be happy ive had the most ridiculously incredible life the past year and a half or so and all this happiness led to the ptsd coming out i just cant let myself be happy im supposed to be miserable it all im used to how do i get past this my life is amazing and great and beautiful and i dont want to die anymore but i dont know how to just be chill with it being so happy with my life is scaring the heck out of me

ever since developing ptsd i have found that the list of movie and tv show i can not watch just get longer and longer i have never been into horror or anything anyways but i did used to watch some fairly intense and suspenseful show and i can not do that anymore at least right now

i have a severe anxiety and panic disorder it make me super aware of my throat and i feel gaggy when my anxiety flare up i also have gerd this past year i have relapsed into really bad panic attack which triggered agoraphobia and most of my time is spent in my bed i am working on therapy after the new year i do not know if it is my head but i am super aware of my throat all the time which then cause me to gag i do not know if this is my anxiety or gerd or even both but it is incredibly frustrating last winter i saw my doctor and i wa gagging so bad in his office that i could barely talk he prescribed me rabeprazole and so i took it for a month or two and then stopped not sure why the gagging is back though and so today i took one i am hoping it doe something and i am just thinking it is my anxiety and my head concentrating too much it is just frustrating because it is hard to eat i will be scared of eating and then gag ugh hopefully this made sense

i have been playing football since th grade and i would say i have wanted to quit since the beginning of th i already thought it wa not worth all the time you put in but now with depression i have no desire what so ever a big problem here is my coach really like me and i dread having to deal with them and also more importantly my dad is an th grade fb coach and would hate if i were to quit i just really do not enjoy it at all anymore and it make getting up for school even harder when we re in season that is the other thing like we re not even in season i try to pride myself on not quitting in the middle of thing so it should not be a big of a deal to him i do not know just thinking about it make me more depressed i am a sophomore right now and i do not think i can take more year of football

ive been an adult my whole life i always had to be just to survive i feel the little girl inside of me but im angry shes still here my life is good now why cant she just leave but i know she cant and im told i have to love her because she got me through it all but all i can feel is resentment that she continues to hold me back

i just wanted to say thank you for the support i received here a couple week ago when i wa in an extremely dark place shorty after posting in here i made the decision to hospitalize myself and just got out today i am so grateful for the kind word i received and to anyone who read this and are currently in that dark place do not give up you are worth so much more than the depression and anxiety are telling you right now i promise it is worth the fight and if you feel like you need professional help i implore you to seek it you are amazing even if you can not see it right now

i am not a fan of self diagnosis and i am currently seeing a therapist and have been professionally diagnosed with depression and anxiety in the past but i know that there is something else wrong with me i have so many weird issue that can not be explained by depression and anxiety like sometimes feeling like i am not real or like i am in a dream or something and my fight or flight response it literally just freeze or accept what is about to happen and brace for it mentally i have gone through trauma in the past that caused me to have intense flashback and i have undergone emdr treatment sometimes i feel really paranoid and disconnected from reality

my depression ha gotten really bad the past year so much so last week i lost my job i couldnt concentrate couldnt remember thing ive never been able to stay organized made mistake got totally overwhelmed got behind got fired sigh also lost my insurance so im weening off the effexor ive been on because i cant get it anymore suffice to say thing are not gong well now im in the awful position of having to look for a job with depression firing on all cylinder anything i would want to do office work having a computer acheat nice coworkers im too stupid to do a evidenced by my last two failed attempt and the other option stuff like factory work make me miserable ive done it before constant overtime weird schedule macho coworkers i hate it so much

what is probably a really stupid thought just came to me a few minute ago i wa sitting on the couch in my back room and burnt my calf with a lighter my dog wa lying on his bed watching me and when i looked at him he looked kind of confused i do not want him suddenly thinking that fire is okay and safe because he saw me cooking my leg can animal tell that somethings wrong if they see someone doing it

i live in small town south dakota and i absolutely hate it i think this largely contributes to my depression i already do not wanna go do anything but then whens it is below half the year it make it even harder also even if i feel like doing something there is hardly anything to do with friend other than movie it is even harder to stay here especially after visiting la this summer and absolutely loving it i am in no position to move either being i am living with my parent anyone else think where they live contributes to their depression

i just ordered myself an adorable little buildabear for valentine day after many year of selfhatred i am finally learning to love myself again a valentine day approach i want to remind everyone that you are so very loved we do not have to have a romantic partner to feel the love on this holiday i hope that this valentine day we can all prioritize our self care and show ourselves some love i love you all so much have a wonderful day

i am constantly going all over the place emotionally one second i am okay then i am suddenly extremely depressed and then i am manic then i am overridden by extreme anger or i just feel fucking nothing like there is a hole inside me and i just sit there slicing into my own skin all the fucking time because i have no energy to do anything else and i always lie to people i care about because i want them to care too but i also hate them but i do not and i get so confused and i hate how attached i am to people because it probably scare them even though they might not even know but i think they do and that scare me because then they will leave and i hate it and i have that i am such a lying cutting depressed unstable piece of shit who spends every second of his life having a fucking existential crisis and being afraid of death but also craving it and not knowing what is happening in my head and not taking my med because i get anxiety around taking them because they could kill me but also maybe not and then of course every time i go for a walk to calm myself

hi everyone i am trying to get a plan together to take care of my mental illness i live at home with my mom and dad so obviously they need to be part of it however they are very not understanding about mental illness at all i have tried to explain to them over and over that the cure for bipolar is not just toughen up i have tried educating them on the disorder but they think mental illness research is a bunch of liberal propaganda i do not know how to deal with them they are not supportive of me trying to find therapy or any help for this disorder a lot of time i think it might be necessary to move out from them

all these story saying i wa extremely depressed a a teen but i got better and eventually graduated with a degree in every subject known to man just feel so unrealistic i mean they could happen sometimes but where are all the story saying i wa extremely depressed a a teen i dropped out of school at and now year later i am still living with my parent without any sort of proper education beyond year covered in self inflicted scar dealing with organ failure due to my drug abuse and and struggling to eat from year of bulimia but hey i am still alive that just sound so much more realistic and it could help those people who are in that position where they can not go to school anymore they are struggling to get out of bed and they do not know what to do

so after smoking for around year i finally bit the bullet at the end of last year and decided to start using the patch to quit i have whittled my way down to the lowest dosage of the patch and have two patch left before my quit day however i just realized that i forgot to put my new patch on when i woke up eight hour ago and you know what i feel perfectly normal and ready to continue my day that make me really happy so happy early quit day to me

i have been through a lot of bullying since kindergarten until last year i am in year now when i wa young i wa not dealing with the bullying i thought it wa normal because it wa something that had always been happening but when it got really bad in year i told my parent eventually because i realised i could not go on with it year it began again and then stopped then it returned yet again in year but when i got to year i began realising how to deal with it i have developed many extremely severe mental illness from lot of trauma i have experienced and this lead to lot of self hatred and lack of self worth and i used this to my advantage when i wa called faggot fuckup fatass gorilla anorexic cutter emo any of it i would laugh and fully agree and even start giving them idea for insult to give me this threw them back a lot but the physical side of it wa still an issue

i am kinda in a mood to tell this story and feel free to put your first cutting deep incident in the comment my first time wa in june last year i wa cutting a lot at the time although i did not even find it an issue it wa just something i did i wa cutting my shoulder a lot at the time and i got home from school went into my room grabbed my blade and got to work now this wa a blade from a shaving razor i had taken apart it wa the sharpest blade in the razor i did not know this at the time so i put the blade to my shoulder and cut i immediately panicked the cut wa gaping open and i could see a bit of weird yellow bubbly stuff in it which i later learnt wa fat the cut wa bleeding a ton so i wa trying to stop the bleeding with about a million tissue i knew i needed stitch but i wa not about to tell anyone what i had done after about half an hour my mum came into my room to remind me that i had a tutoring lesson and we had to leave i freaked the fuck out my shoulder wa still gaping open although the bleeding had slowed down

hey guy so i do not post here often but i suffer from adhd depression and anxiety so long story short i wa diagnosed around october although i should have been diagnosed a long while ago so the first thing i went in for wa adhd it took me this long to go in for this i am a sophomore in high school mainly because although i could not pay attention i wa smart enough to do well if that make sense and the main reason i actually did work wa because of anxiety especially with my parent being teacher but a i got older starting around middle school the material wa getting harder so i had to pay attention to do a well a i normally did and then i hit my lowest low in high school particularly this year

tonight i bought myself a baby froggy his name is beepy and he really cheered me up engineering school is tough so little thing like this make me feel so much better when i put him in the tank with my other two frog bappy and bippy he started singing
